data.title: 180 mayors adopt Paris climate accord after U.S. pulls out: 'The group of mayors, who represent more than 51 million Americans and some of the largest U.S. cities, outlined a plan to align with the other 194 nations that adopted the accord'
Jeremy Corbyn accuses Theresa May of ignoring terror warnings when she cut 20,000 police officers and claims she is suppressing a report about Saudi funding of extremists

Iran said on Sunday the London attacks were a "wake-up call" and urged Western states to go after ideological and financial sources of terrorism, state media reported, in a thinly veiled reference to Saudi Arabia.
Theresa May says the internet must now be regulated following London Bridge terror attack

Donald Trump has sparked fury after hitting out at Sadiq Khan over his response to the London terror attack: Trump tweeted, “At least 7 dead and 48 wounded in terror attack and Mayor of London says there is ‘no reason to be alarmed!’”
We do need to have some difficult conversations starting with Saudi Arabia and other Gulf states that have funded and fuelled extremist ideology - Jeremy Corbyn
Australian government report doctored to pretend gas cheaper than wind and solar
London terrorist had twice been referred to police over his extremist views
The Tories just lost a court case that could finally expose the stealth privatisation of the NHS

A call by Prime Minister Theresa May to regulate tech firms in the wake of the London attacks has been criticised: Open Rights Group said more regulation could push "these vile networks into even darker corners of the web".
